multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Pediatrics and Neonatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I often fail to answer when called, have unprovoked episodes of crying and screaming, and I don't follow instructions when they are given to me directly.
How old are you?
I am 4 years old.
Do you have any issues with your hearing, such as not responding to sounds or frequently asking for things to be repeated?
I often fail to answer when my parents call me.
Have you experienced any delays in your speech or language development?
I started speaking in two-to-three-word phrases and often mispronounce words.
Has a medical professional ever evaluated your hearing?
I have not provided any information about being evaluated by a medical professional for my hearing.
It would be important to know if you've undergone any hearing tests. Have you ever had a hearing test performed?
I have not provided any information about having undergone a hearing test.
Do you have any difficulties in social interactions with other children or adults, such as making eye contact, playing, or sharing?
I maintain eye contact when spoken to but do not respond when engaged in play, although I get along well with friends and family.
Do you often engage in repetitive actions or show extreme resistance to changes in routine or environment?
I have not provided any information about engaging in repetitive actions or showing resistance to changes in routine or environment.
Is there any family history of developmental disorders or hearing problems?
I have not provided any information about family history of developmental disorders or hearing problems.
Final Diagnosis: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)
